description: Leadership of a team of 3 front-end developers and 3 full-stack developers, distributed across 3 Scrum/Kanban teams. Responsible for the extensibility/scalability and quality of front-end development at karriere.at, including people, process and technology.

company: University of Applied Sciences Upper Austria, Hagenberg
description: Teaching “Hypermedia User Experience Engineering” in the “Interactive Media” program. Topics include JavaScript, front-end frameworks (mainly Vue.js), tooling (webpack, Parcel, …), Progressive Web Apps, client/server communication (REST APIs, WebSockes, NoSQL, …), GraphQL, unit testing, end-to-end testing, and other front-end development matters.

Technical leadership of a cross-functional Scrum/Kanban team. Responsible for code quality (security, performance, extensibility/scalability …), architecture, stakeholder communication, technical concepts and technology evaluation, training and mentoring of fellow developers. Assistance in recruiting and employer branding topics (open-source projects and developer blog; external talks, trainings and workshops …)

company: University of Applied Sciences Kufstein, Tirol
description: Supervision of a master’s thesis in the “Web Communication & Information Systems” program.
